biotools.summary:
An R package calculating R-squared measures for multilevel models.
Generates both total- and level-specific R-squared measures from Rights and Sterba’s (2019) framework of R-squared measures for multilevel models with random intercepts and or slopes, which is based on a complete decomposition of variance.

bioschemas.name: r2mlm
bioschemas.summary:
An R package calculating R-squared measures for multilevel models.
Generates both total- and level-specific R-squared measures from Rights and Sterba’s (2019) framework of R-squared measures for multilevel models with random intercepts and or slopes, which is based on a complete decomposition of variance.
